abstract.t: This document modifies RFC 3978 "IETF Rights in Contributions" as follows: (1) recognizing that the IETF Trust is now the proper custodian of all IETF-related intellectual property rights, (2) giving IETF Trust the right to permit extraction of material from RFCs, and (3) giving IETF Trust the right to permit others to create derivative works outside the IETF Standards Process. This document does not constrain how the IETF Trust exercises those rights.
